error.message: The UPDATE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint "FK_dbo.Users_dbo.Branches_BranchId". The conflict occurred in database "FitHouseDB", table "dbo.Branches", column 'BranchId'. The statement has been terminated.
